verbs.description: [ARG0: Patrick Fitzgerald] [V: joins] [ARG1: Comey 's team] [ARGM-PRP: to represent him in matters related to special counsel Robert Mueller 's Russia investigation and Trump obstruction case] .

Patrick Fitzgerald joins Comey 's team to represent him in [ARG1: matters] [V: related] [ARG2: to special counsel Robert Mueller 's Russia investigation and Trump obstruction case] .
